SEARCH
Package com.raylib.jextract

Class Model

java.lang.Object
com.raylib.jextract.Model
public class Model extends Object
struct Model {
    Matrix transform;
    int meshCount;
    int materialCount;
    Mesh *meshes;
    Material *materials;
    int *meshMaterial;
    int boneCount;
    BoneInfo *bones;
    Transform *bindPose;
}

      public static MemorySegment asSlice(MemorySegment array, long index)
